posts.raw_content:
And we citizens are all:

Stockholders

And also

Customers

And some the base are also Employees 

The worst thing any politician or political movement can do is when they starts thinking of the base as just a bunch of employees and not stockholders and customers

Got to listen to the base .... They are stockholders in the business and they are customers of the product... They have a say

That was always the problem with the old GOPE.. too many think of the party base as  employees that need to always sit down and shut up

Trump is a great CEO ... He's taking the company in the direction that needs to be taken...

But you got to listen to us as stockholders sometime and you got to listen to us as customers sometimes... 

Never start thinking of us the base as just employees

The infighting It's not helpful
